codeSystems.name: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.title: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.description: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

codeSystems.name: Identifier Type Codes
codeSystems.title: IdentifierType
codeSystems.description: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

codeSystems.name: IdentifierUse
codeSystems.title: IdentifierUse
codeSystems.description: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

codeSystems.name: CommonLanguages
codeSystems.title: Common Languages
codeSystems.description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

codeSystems.name: LinkType
codeSystems.title: LinkType
codeSystems.description: The type of link between this patient resource and another patient resource.

codeSystems.name: LocationMode
codeSystems.title: LocationMode
codeSystems.description: Indicates whether a resource instance represents a specific location or a class of locations.

codeSystems.name: LocationType
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the physical form of the Location.

codeSystems.name: LocationStatus
codeSystems.title: LocationStatus
codeSystems.description: Indicates whether the location is still in use.

codeSystems.name: Marital Status Codes
codeSystems.title: MaritalStatus
codeSystems.description: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

codeSystems.name: PatientContactRelationship
codeSystems.title: Patient Contact Relationship
codeSystems.description: The nature of the relationship between the patient and the contact person.

codeSystems.name: SMARTVALevelofEducationVS
codeSystems.title: SMART Verbal Autopsy Level of Education ValueSet
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains values related to the SMART Verbal Autopsy level of education of the decseaed person.

codeSystems.name: SMARTVAWeatherSeasonsVS
codeSystems.title: SMART Verbal Autopsy Weather Seasons ValueSet
codeSystems.description: SMART Verbal Autopsy valueset for describing weather seasons

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSBedStatus
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-bedStatus
codeSystems.description: Value Set of codes that specify the state of a bed in an inpatient setting, and is used to determine if a patient may be assigned to it or not.

codeSystems.name: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
codeSystems.title: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
codeSystems.description: A role of a place that further classifies the setting (e.g., accident site, road side, work site, community location) in which services are delivered.

codeSystems.name: SMARTVAHIVMortalityRegionVS
codeSystems.title: SMART VA HIV Mortality Region Value Set
codeSystems.description: SMART VA HIV Mortality Region Value Set to capture HIV prevelance of a location

codeSystems.name: SMARTVAMalarioMortalityRegionVS
codeSystems.title: SMART Va Malaria Mortality Region ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet to capture the region Malaria mortality prevelance for SMART verbal autopsy
